Gridlines text ShowGridLinesInCurrentShe: While working on a sheet, the property ShowGridLinesInCurrentSheet controls whether the gridlines are shown. Enabled by default.
Gridlines text PrintGridLinesInCurrentSh: While working on a sheet, the property PrintGridLinesInCurrentSheet controls whether the gridlines are printed. Disabled by default.
Headings text ShowRowAndColumnHeadingsIn: While working on a sheet, the property ShowRowAndColumnHeadingsInCurrentSheet controls whether the headings (Column letters and row numbers) are shown. Enabled by default.
Headings text PrintRowAndColumnHeadingsI: While working on a sheet, the property PrintRowAndColumnHeadingsInCurrentSheet controls whether the headings (Column letters and row numbers) are printed. Disabled by default.
